subject: Economy
question_en: What is the main objective of a fiscal policy?
question_hi: वर्तमान कार्यक्रम क्या आधारित करने का मुख्य मूल्य है।
A_hi: सरकारी कार्यतः प्रतिकृति और प्रतिकृति के अनुसूचित करना
B_hi: भारतीय वि carved in the context of Pakistan independence
explanation_en: The main objective of fiscal policy is to achieve economic growth. It involves controlling government spending and raising taxes to stimulate the economy.
